--- DateTime: 2022/2/7 18:03
---
ConfigUtils = {}

function ConfigUtils:getConBase(tabName,id)
    if id == nil then
        Logger.Error("id == nil")
        return nil
    end
    if tabName == nil then
        Logger.Error("tabName == nil")
        return nil
    end
    local con = ConfigReader:getDataByNameAndId(tabName,id)
    if con then
        Logger.Error(tabName," 表内找不到 id 为 ",id ,"  得数据")
    end
    return con
end
--- Hero_DetailCon
function ConfigUtils:getHero_DetailCon(id)
    return self:getConBase("Hero_Detail",id)
end
--- Skill_Base
function ConfigUtils:getSkill_BaseCon(id)
    return self:getConBase("Skill_Base",id)
end


return ConfigUtils
